title:
Does the party I'm registered with have anything to do with the number of electoral votes for NC.   I'm registered with one party, but generally split my vote according to the person running for the office, their reputation and whether or not I agree with what is important to them vs. what I think is most important.



If so, what is the deadline to change party affiliation?   Will it make any difference for the November election?



Sarah
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/01/does-the-party-im-registered-with-have-anything-to-do-with-the-number-of-n-c-electoral-votes-what-is-the-deadline-to-change-my-party-affiliation/
